overview: Adorable 19-year-old cutie Lucky Adams and pals give you an up-close-and-personal demonstration of what it really means to "Get Lucky!" he and his hot and horny friend Shane Scott take turns jacking off for you, both shooting bucketloads of sticky boycum. Then cute twinks Ethan Masters and Tyler Hart hook up and get each other off big-time, and in the final scene, Lucky has a supernatural - and super HOT - encounter with a sexy "ghost" in the form of irresistible Corey Stevens! Who knew ghostbusting could be this much fun!
title: Citi Boyz 10: Getting Lucky
